apps

Class HttpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • apps.HttpServer

  • public class HttpServer
extends Object
    Big Http Server implements a web server that can return html, images and other files.
    Author:
    Carlos Medina

    • Method Detail

      • httpHandler

        public static void httpHandler(String[] header,
                               PrintWriter out,
                               BufferedOutputStream dataOut)
                        throws IOException
        Http handler allows to receive a request and process it to generate a response.
        Parameters:
        header - represents the header of the request.
        out - represents the output stream that allows send data as a strings.
        dataOut - represents the binary output used to send files as images, html and more.
        Throws:
        IOException - : in case that a file could not be found.

      • headerResponse

        public static void headerResponse(PrintWriter out,
                                  File file,
                                  String contentType,
                                  String response)
        Header response creates the response header to the request.
        Parameters:
        out - represents the output stream that allows send data as a strings.
        file - represents the file to extract the length of it.
        contentType - represents the content type that is going to be send through the server.
        response - represents the http code used to determine if a request was successful (200 OK) or fail (404 NOT FOUND).

      • contentResponse

        public static void contentResponse(File file,
                                   BufferedOutputStream dataOut)
                            throws IOException
        Content response send to the client the file or thing that was requested.
        Parameters:
        file - represents the file to send in the response.
        dataOut - represents the binary output used to send files as images, html and more.
        Throws:
        IOException - : in case that a file could not be found or the output stream presents an error.
